replies.author: LDX-ALI
replies.txt_content: 内个...我又孤陋寡闻了，eclipse是什么？....

replies.author: czphoenix
replies.txt_content: 额 确定是先在minecraft.jar里塞进ModLoader再decompile的么

czphoenix 发表于 2012-8-18 09:08 
额 确定是先在minecraft.jar里塞进ModLoader再decompile的么
没,怎么办?

replies.author: czphoenix
replies.txt_content:
70193142 发表于 2012-8-18 09:35 
没,怎么办?
找对应版本的ModLoader塞进minecraft.jar么 再运行decompile.bat
minecraftforum.net/topic/960286-techguys-modding-tutorials

czphoenix 发表于 2012-8-18 22:30 
找对应版本的ModLoader塞进minecraft.jar么 再运行decompile.bat

replies.author: Protoss_Dragon
replies.txt_content: 工程里面没有ModLoader类，说明minecraft.jar里面加modloader吧。。。
